name: Planet Chaos (Mfa Xyz, Negar Abedini, alikarimi7, Mohammad Aghae)
name_original: Planet Chaos (Mfa Xyz, Negar Abedini, alikarimi7, Mohammad Aghae)
description:
There has been a disorder in the orbits of your nearby planets. Soon, they will reach your own planet and crash with it. All you have is a ship to destroy them before they reach you.

Made for the Brackeys game jam 2021.2 on the theme "Let there be Chaos".

You must destroy all planets by crashing them with your laser gun!
